actions.text: On agreeing to the Hayes amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 383 - 34, 4 Present (Roll no. 166).

description: Amendment clarifies that the provisions of the regulatory rulemaking moratorium should not effect any regulatory program to establish or conduct a recreational or subsistence activity, including but not limited to hunting, fishing, and camping.
purpose: An amendment to clarify that the provisions of the regulatory rulemaking moratorium should not effect any regulatory program to establish or conduct a recreational or subsistence activity, including but not limited to hunting, fishing, and camping.
